desc: mSubset compares a FITS header file to an image metadata table and selects out just those records in the latter overlapping with the template region.

arguments.name: template
arguments.desc: FITS header file used to define the desired output.

arguments.name: subtbl
arguments.desc: Subset of the metadata table that overlap with the template.

arguments.name: fastMode
arguments.desc: Overlap check just involves great circles connecting the image/template corners.

return.name: count
return.desc: Number of images in the input table.
